attributes.action: Stop making disabled people go back to work
attributes.additional_details: I personally believe that disabled people shouldn't be forced to go back to work and make their disability/illness worse because of ignorant people who don't fully understand their disability and what limits they can go to. I think this law should be revoked.
attributes.background: I have a disabled mum who's being told she has to go back to work, she got told by the professionals that do the assessments because she can walk a few metres and lift her arm up she is fit for work? They are categorising all disabled people under one category. It's not fair

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to change the criteria  used to decide whether someone with a disability is fit for work, or to abolish Work Capability Assessments for all disabled people.
